deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

transferAndCall(TokenStorage,address,add.details: Transfers tokens and subsequently calls a method on the recipient [ERC677]. If the recipient is a non-contract address this method behaves just like transfer.

params.caller: Address of the caller passed through the frontend.
params.data: Additional data passed to the recipient's tokenFallback method.

transferAndCall(TokenStorage,address,add.notice: db.transfer either returns true or reverts.
